Articles.Content: Im a huge fan of making my own cockpits (because the stock cockpits suck for fighters) so i was wondering if there was a way (in 1.1 preferably) i could look through my kerbals eyes from the EVA command seat?
Use the "camera focus changer" mod (I hope I spelled it right) and focus on a part in front of the kerbal then zoom in and use the middle mouse button to reorient the view and voila
